entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's best friend, also a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who seems to have a grudge against Harry.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts, which Harry is a part of.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Harry's older brothers, also students at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: The gamekeeper at Hogwarts, who lives in a small wooden house on the edge of the Forbidden Forest.

entities.name: forbidden forest
entities.description: A restricted area near Hogwarts where magical creatures live.

relationships.description: Harry seems to have a negative relationship with Snape, who takes points off him for no reason.
Ron is friends with Hagrid and wants to meet him.
Snape also seems to have a grudge against Fred and George, taking points off them as well.
